message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.NE 

This paper discusses optimization algorithms commonly used in machine learning, such as SDCA, SAG, and SVRG, and proposes a method to reduce their runtime by reusing previously used samples. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision), as these fields heavily rely on optimization algorithms. Additionally, cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) could also be relevant sub-categories, as they deal with optimization and machine learning techniques.
